mapper.insert: INSERT INTO traderequest_status( serialno, priorno, referno, seqno, custno, applyst, transst, payst, summary, modifyflag, paydt, paytm, updatetimestamp) VALUES (#{param.serialNo}, #{param.priorNo}, #{referNo}, #{seqNo}, #{custNo}, #{applySt}, #{transSt}, #{paySt}, #{summary}, #{modifyFlag}, #{payDt}, #{payTm}, #{updateTimeStamp});
